messages.content: My vision for Portsmouth South Constituency is a vibrant local economy and seaside city which is welcoming to all, values and listens to local residents and makes Portsmouth a city to be proud of.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour Government would scrap the Bedroom Tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Freeze gas and electricity bills until 2017
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze gas and electricity bills until 2017 and reform the energy market.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cut income tax for hardworking people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut income tax for hardworking people through a lower 10p starting tax rate and introduce a 50p top rate of tax.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Raise the minimum wage to £8 an hour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise the minimum wage to £8 an hour and provide tax breaks to firms that pay the living wage.
Help working parents with 25 hours free childcare for three and four year-olds.
Back the next generation with a job guarantee for the young unemployed and more apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give the NHS 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give the NHS 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses, funded by a mansion tax on homes worth over £2 million.

issues.economy: Cut income tax for hardworking people through a lower 10p starting tax rate and introduce a 50p top rate of tax.
issues.health: Give the NHS 8,000 more doctors and 20,000 more nurses, funded by a mansion tax on homes worth over £2 million.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been a resident of Portsmouth for over 20 years and have worked in the city as a council approved community tutor for volunteers and paid staff.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Parallel leaflets for Sue Castillon and Benjamin Perry emphasize Labour policies on housing, cost of living, healthcare, and reductions in tuition fees. Personal statements and endorsements are provided for Sue Castillon, with contact information included for voter engagement.
